price: Naye tukampa Is-haq, na Yaaqub kuwa ni ziada. Na wote tukawajaalia wawe watu wema.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ نَافِلَةٗۖ وَكُلّٗا جَعَلۡنَا صَٰلِحِينَ
footnotes: Na tukampa Ibrahim mtoto Is-haq, na kutokana na Is-haq tukampa Yaaqubu, zaidi kuliko aliyo taka. Na wote wawili, Is-haq na Yaaqubu tuliwajaalia kuwa ni watu wema.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lahu is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba nāfilatan wakullan jaʿalnā ṣāliḥīna
